text: Nɨ fo, fomɨra siosɨn gumazir dapaniba uan dafariba isa nɨn dapanim garɨki. Ezɨ dughiar kam Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazir mam akamɨn gun nɨ mɨkeme, ezɨ tuavir kamɨn God bizir aghuimɨn mɨn uan gavgavim isa ingangarim bagha nɨ ganɨngi. Ezɨ kɨ nɨ mɨgei, nɨ gavgavir kam ataghraghan markɨ, nɨ a sara Godɨn ingangarim damuvɨra ikɨ.
